Class MOTD

extends java.lang.Object

    Marcus Poole

      • getPuzzle

        private static java.lang.String getPuzzle()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method that retrieves the unsolved puzzle String and solves it by calling other methods.
        Returns:
        Solved the solved puzzle with numChar add the number of characters in the solution added to the end.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.

      • getMOTD

        public static java.lang.String getMOTD()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Method that retrieves the message of the day from the URL solved from the puzzle.
        Returns:
        The message of the day.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.

      • weirdCaesar

        private static java.lang.String weirdCaesar(java.lang.String value)
        Method that solves the puzzle using same method as to solve Caesar cyphers.
        Parameters:
        value - This is the unsolved puzzle String.
        Returns:
        The solved puzzle.

      • merge

        private static java.lang.String merge(java.lang.String s1,
                                      java.lang.String s2)
        Method that merges the two Strings together and removes the duplicate/ excess places in the Strings.
        Parameters:
        s1 - The first String, to be merged into.
        s2 - The second String, to merge into s1.
        Returns:
        The result of merging the two strings.
